message:
The beauty of #OPPOR11, made clearer. 

It‚Äôs the last 4 hours till we close the pre-order: bit.ly/R11PreOrder. Be one of those who pre-ordered to receive complimentary engraving service, a pair of movie tickets and a set of Bluetooth headphone!

If you‚Äôre also gunning for a personalized phone, we are taking in walk-in orders. Simply flash your #OPPOR11 between 1st ‚Äì 3rd July at OPPO Suntec Store to get it done. Of course, we would have to keep your new love with us for a couple of days, due to overwhelming response. üòâ
Here‚Äôs a #throwback to the #OPPOR11 Launch Event. Special thanks to the mio Stadium Next Host finalists and our Official Fashion Partner, ZALORA, for making it a success!

Less than 48 hours till you lay your hands on the #OPPOR11 + movie tickets + Bluetooth headphone!

Where should you be: OPPO Suntec Store 
When should you be there: 1st July, 11am-3pm
What should you bring: NRIC, Confirmation 
Email or Receipt and a dose of excitement

Last call for our pre-order here: bit.ly/R11PreOrder. Don't say we "bo jio".

500 sets of the #OPPOR11 have been pre-ordered! That can only mean one thing. 
You get a Bluetooth headphone.
You get a Bluetooth headphone.
EVERYBODY GETS A HEADPHONE! (+ complimentary engraving and a pair of movie tickets)
Pre-order now for a deal not to be missed: http://bit.ly/R11PreOrder

#OPPOR11 - a camera phone like no other. But don't take our words for it, take theirs. ;) Enjoy a complimentary pair of Movie Tickets with every pre-order made now, and even a set of Bluetooth headphones! The world's most sophisticated camera phone is yours here: http://bit.ly/R11PreOrder

<Announcement> We've unlocked 300 sets! This means that everyone who pre-orders/pre-ordered the #OPPOR11 will receive a complimentary pair of Movie Tickets. :D We‚Äôre now only 200 sets away from unlocking the Bluetooth headphones as an additional exclusive gift. So, for those who haven‚Äôt pre-ordered your R11, get yours here today: http://bit.ly/R11PreOrder. From all of us at OPPO, thank you for your support!
Wishing all our Muslim friends in Singapore, Selamat Hari Raya! May this festive season bring you love, peace and prosperity!
Here's everything you need to know about the brand new OPPO R11: http://bit.ly/OPPOR11, and get yours with a personalized engraved message via pre-order: http://bit.ly/R11PreOrder.

Want to win a pair of tickets to the premiere of Spider-Man: Homecoming on 2nd July? Well, to celebrate the launch of the R11, we have 11 pairs to give away! 

Simply like this post and tag a fellow Spidey fan for a chance to win. Oh, and if you haven't heard, the pre-order of OPPO R11 is up now: http://bit.ly/R11PreOrder.

The pre-order of #OPPOR11 begins. Featuring 20MP front and rear facing cameras, it's #BeautyMadeClearer. Enjoy complimentary engraving service on your R11 and receive additional gifts when you pre-order yours, here: http://bit.ly/R11PreOrder.

Only 1 more day to our Official #OPPOR11 Launch Event. 
Wait for it. There's more to come. ;)
